00020 ///
00021 // Loads resources for the menu. Caution: This is only used for the game launcher menu
00022 // If you want to load the game resources, look at CEGAGraphicsVort or CEGAGraphicsGalaxy subclasses
00023 ///
00024 bool CEGAGraphics::loadData()
00025 {
00026  // This is only for the menu. We only need one fontmap
00027  g_pGfxEngine->createEmptyFontmaps(1);
00028  CFont &Font = g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0);
00029  Font.destroySurface();
00030  Font.CreateSurface( g_pGfxEngine->Palette.m_Palette, SDL_SWSURFACE, g_pVideoDriver->getDepth() );
00031  Font.optimizeSurface();
00032 
00033  std::string filename = getResourceFilename("gfx/menufonts.bmp", "", true, true);
00034 
00035  Font.loadHiColourFont(filename);
00036  Font.setFGColour(g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface->format, 0x0, true);
00037 
00038  g_pGfxEngine->createEmptyCursorMap(Font.getSDLColouredSurface());
00039  CCursor *pCursor = g_pGfxEngine->getCursor();
00040  pCursor->generateTwirls(Font);
00041 
00042  return true;
00043 }
